title: Rich chocolate cup cakes
ingredients: ['113g (4oz) caster sugar', '113g (4oz) butter', '113g (4oz) self-raising flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '10g cocoa powder', '120ml milk', '1 egg', 'For the icing', '85g (3oz) butter', '1 to 2 tablespoons water or milk', '1 1/2 teaspoons cocoa powder', '170g (6oz) icing sugar, sieved']
